class_notes:
(Same as MUS 270 3)
This course is a North Indian Music Ensemble. For more information please contact the instructor.
course_description: This course trains students to understand music traditions of the MESAS region (South Asia, South-East Asia, the Middle East or North Africa) and to perform music in the context to intellectual, cultural and artistic traditions of the region.
sections: Class Nbr: 6361, Section #: 1, Type: MUS, Campus: ATL, Meets: T 7-9p, Instructor: S. Kugle, Status: Open
